name: sri4node
description: An implementation of SRI (Standard ROA Interface) on Node.js.

scripts.pretest:old: npm run clean && mkdir -p ./dist/js && npm run postbuild && (npm run testcleanup || /bin/true)
scripts.test:old: ./node_modules/kov-docker-utils/kov-docker-utils postgres start sri4node_postgresdbfortests 15432 ./docker/postgres_initdb && ./node_modules/.bin/mocha --exit --require ts-node/register ./test/tests.ts; R=$?; ./node_modules/kov-docker-utils/kov-docker-utils postgres stop sri4node_postgresdbfortests; exit $R
scripts.test: ./node_modules/kov-docker-utils/kov-docker-utils postgres start sri4node_postgresdbfortests 15432 ./docker/postgres_initdb && ./node_modules/.bin/mocha --exit --require ts-node/register ./test/tests.ts; R=$?; ./node_modules/kov-docker-utils/kov-docker-utils postgres stop sri4node_postgresdbfortests; exit $R
scripts.// *:no-ts-node: these tests are UNFINISHED, and try to compile the tests first instead of running them with ts-node
scripts.//pretest:no-ts-node: npm run build:esbuild && tsc --project ./tsconfig.test.json && (npm run testcleanup || /bin/true)
scripts.//test:no-ts-node: ./node_modules/kov-docker-utils/kov-docker-utils postgres start sri4node_postgresdbfortests 15432 ./docker/postgres_initdb && ./node_modules/.bin/mocha --exit ./dist.test/tests.js; R=$?; ./node_modules/kov-docker-utils/kov-docker-utils postgres stop sri4node_postgresdbfortests; exit $R
scripts.//: test:bundles -> will run the tests against the compiled bundles (CJS and ESM module) to check whether they are ok
scripts.test:bundles: SRI4NODE_TEST_MODULE_TYPE=CJS npm run test; SRI4NODE_TEST_MODULE_TYPE=ESM npm run test

author: Dimitry D'hondt <dimitry.dhondt@yahoo.com> (https://github.com/dimitrydhondt/sri4node)
